data.name: Sample - Microsoft Intune - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Microsoft Intune" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get iOS Policy Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific iOS policy from Microsoft Intune API based on the hostname, policy name and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Intune: Get iOS Policy Details

routes.name: Start -> Get iOS Policy Details

workflows.name: Update Android Policy
workflows.description: Updates a android policy in Microsoft Intune based on the hostname, policy name, friendly name and other input parameters you have specified.

routes.name: Start -> Update Android Policy

workflows.name: Delete iOS Policy
workflows.description: Deletes a specific iOS policy from Microsoft Intune based on the hostname and policy name you have specified.
